variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-module-build
dependencies.description:
Module::Build is a system for building, testing, and installing Perl
modules. It is meant to be an alternative to ExtUtils::MakeMaker.
Developers may alter the behavior of the module through subclassing in a
much more straightforward way than with MakeMaker. It also does not
require a make on your system - most of the Module::Build code is pure-
perl and written in a very cross-platform way.

dependent_to.name: perl-specio
dependent_to.description: Type constraints and coercions for Perl .

dependent_to.name: perl-moox-types-mooselike
dependent_to.description: Some Moosish types and a type builder

dependent_to.name: perl-throwable
dependent_to.description: A role for classes that can be thrown

dependent_to.name: perl-test-cleannamespaces
dependent_to.description:
This module lets you check your module's namespaces for imported
functions you might have forgotten to remove

dependent_to.name: perl-email-stuffer
dependent_to.description: A more casual approach to creating and sending Email:: emails

dependent_to.name: perl-class-accessor-grouped
dependent_to.description: Lets you build groups of accessors

dependent_to.name: perl-log-dispatch
dependent_to.description: Dispatches messages to one or more outputs

dependent_to.name: perl-file-changenotify
dependent_to.description: Watch for changes to files, cross-platform style

dependent_to.name: perl-module-implementation
dependent_to.description: Loads one of several alternate underlying implementations for a module

dependent_to.name: perl-moosex-getopt
dependent_to.description: A Moose role for processing command line options

dependent_to.name: perl-datetime-timezone
dependent_to.description: DateTime::TimeZone - Time zone object base class and factory

dependent_to.name: perl-test-class
dependent_to.description: Easily create test classes in an xUnit/JUnit style
